email_subject: Question about your work at spotify
email_body:
Hi piper,

My name is Nicholas Wittig, and I'm a 2027 Management at University of Southern California (USC) pursuing a career in technology and engineering. I came across your profile while researching professionals at spotify, and I was particularly interested in your experience building products at spotify.

I'd be grateful for the chance to hear more about your career journey and what drew you to spotify. Would you be open to a 15-20 minute call in the next couple of weeks?

Best,
Nicholas Wittig
